<<<<<<< HEAD
Ten sermons upon several occasions, preached at Saint Pauls Crosse, and elsewhere. By the Right Reverend Father in God Arthur Lake late Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells Lake, Arthur, 1569-1626.
[8], 173, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Badger, for Humphrey Mosley, and are to bee sold at his shop at the Princes Armes in Saint Pauls Church-yard, London : 1640.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-Z⁴ (-Z4). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
